function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited learning from public health crises","Impact":"Failure to effectively respond to future pandemics and public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Adopting community health protection and promotion practices in addition to traditional public health emergency measures","Technologies":"Community intelligence platforms, data analytics tools for health monitoring","People":"Public health authorities, community organizers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizers"},{"Description":"Authoritarian dimension of public health emergencies","Impact":"Reduced community cooperation and compliance, potential for conflict and resistance","Mitigation":"Integration of community health intelligence to precede, join, and follow traditional public health emergency measures","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication tools for public health education","People":"Public health authorities, community leaders, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of rapid adaptation to new circumstances","Impact":"Inability to respond quickly to emerging health threats and changing conditions","Mitigation":"Development of smart community practices, reliance on established community networks, and access to real-time health data","Technologies":"Community intelligence platforms, data analysis and modeling tools, communication and collaboration platforms","People":"Community members, local leaders, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Community leaders, local government"}]}
